Usage

Shaping with font created from an FT_Face (requires Hamza to be built with Freetype)

#define HZ_USE_FREETYPE
#include <hz.h>

int main(int argc, char *argv[])
{
    const char *text = "Hello, World!";
    FT_Library ft_lib;

}

hz_shape
HZ_API void hz_shape(
hz_font_t *font,
hz_sequence_t *sequence,
const hz_feature_t *features,
unsigned int num_features
)

Shapes a text sequence to positioned glyphs. If features is NULL, then default features are loaded for the sequence's script.

Arguments
font
hz_font_t*

Pointer to the font.

sequence
hz_sequence_t*

Pointer to sequence with loaded text.

features
const hz_feature_t*

Array of features to apply.

num_features
unsigned int

Number of features.
